title: Calm Zombie
author: Serialnumber2012
citation: Serialnumber2012. "Calm Zombie: experience with Cylcobenzaprint (Flexeril), Alprazolam (Xanax) & Energy Drink (Caffiene, Ginko biloba, Ginseng, Guarana & Taurine) (ID 34807)". Erowid.org. Dec 27, 2007. erowid.org/exp/34807
substance: Cylcobenzaprint (Flexeril), Alprazolam (Xanax) & Energy Drink (Caffiene, Ginko biloba, Ginseng, Guarana & Taurine)
footer: Age at time of experience: Not Given

[ View as PDF (for printing) ] [ View as LaTeX (for geeks) ]
[ Switch Colors ]
report:
20mg flexril
0.5 mg xanax
1 rockstar energy drink
Started off around 10pm, dosed pills, went driving (I was passenger).
T + 20 min onset, bought energy drink, feeling definiate head change. 
T + 60 reclined in seat, eyes half open, extremely relaxed and calm, a bit disociated, but not in a bad way. Listening to music, hearing/focusing on sounds I haven't heard before with a familiar CD (smashing pumpkins-siamese dream) and really getting into it.
T + 90 arrive back at apartment, talk with other roomate, feeling like I'm ready for sleep
T + 120 in room, unusually horny, masturbate to porn. Unusually long orgasm.
T + 140 sleeps like a cadaver.
Slept for 12 hours, woke up, still lazyish, get up, still feel calm, body feels relaxed & 'loose'. Meditation feels good.
I suggest doing this after a long hard week, and when you have at least 24 hours of free time and no responcibilities, next time I will try this combo with cannabis.
